website_summaries.verdict: A good balance between portable bonnet dryers and the more salon-like options.
pros: Folds and unfolds quickly for more mobility compared to salon bonnet dryers
Quick drying results for short-to-medium hair styles
Large cap preserves the hair style underneath
cons: Lacks more extensive settings and controls

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: DO NOT PURCHASE This Conair Pro Styler Hair Dryer!
customer_reviews.text: If zero stars was an option, this dryer would have earned a 0 with flying colors. Do yourself a favor and DO NOT PURCHASE THIS DRYER! I ordered this hair dryer because my previous dryer broke. What a waste! Temp choices are either cool to scalding. There is no way to adjust (raise or lower) the hood's height and it does not lock in place (moves up and down, does not sit in one position you have to hold it in place while it is on your head). If you don't mind having the hood constantly hit you in the head or holding the hood in place while your fingers burn, then congratulations...this is the dryer for you.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The height doesn’t lower down. when it’s on high ...
customer_reviews.text: The height doesn’t lower down. when it’s on high it burns my scalp when it’s on low it doesn’t dry my hair. It doesn’t dry the bottom part of my hair. Definitely returning Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cord melts  ... when using the dryer
customer_reviews.text: Broke after having less than a year. The cord melted as the dryer was cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: rosalyn emerson

customer_reviews.title: SO HAPPY I MADE THIS PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Why haven't I bought this sooner. This fits perfectly on a table and over my clients head and lifted the highlights I was doing, just I had hoped it would. If you do hair at home or just need an extra dryer, this one is it. I especially like the vent at the top of the hood to let out some air, that way the person underneath doesn't get to super hot. This was definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: *Nice hair dryer*
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this purchase. This dryer works well for drying curly hair. A photo of how I set mine up for use. Folds up and packs away very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Kosters

customer_reviews.title: We were disappointed that there was no way to raise or lower ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hair dryer for my mother who had a similar older model. We were disappointed that there was no way to raise or lower the height of the dryer hood. The older model was more adjustable. After several chair changes and two different table heights, she has found an adequate arrangement.
customer_reviews.author: Dink

customer_reviews.title: This dryer sounds like a jet engine taking off
customer_reviews.text: This dryer sounds like a jet engine taking off. The hood doesn't adjust for my 7 year old to sit under, even with her sitting on the pillow. I'm promptly returning.
customer_reviews.author: LaKeisha

customer_reviews.title: I am hugely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Dryer shuts off after using it for five minutes. I had the dryer for approximately two months. I am hugely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great basic dryer
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is great. Its nothing fancy but it works for what I need it to do which is to apply heat to my hair while I deep condition. It has a low or high setting and thats it. The high gets pretty hot I have not used it on low yet. If your looking for a basic hairdryer then this would be perfect but if your looking for something more heavy duty then this dryer might not be the best option. I like it and plan to use it weekly for my deep conditioning treatments.Packaging and delivery were great.
customer_reviews.author: Debmun1215

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It seems pretty impossible to get the back of my head to dry while the top burns.
customer_reviews.author: T. SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design/Doesn’t Dry Hair Well
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is poorly designed. I sat under the dryer for one hour, the back and sides of my hair remained wet! Only the top was dry. The hood has holes only at the top. The sides of the hood had no holes for air, therefore the sides and back of my hair received ancillary heat and airflow from the top. Bad design. I have returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kjcesquire

customer_reviews.title: The holes in the hood are only at the top
customer_reviews.text: This dryer only has holes at the top. If your hair is thick on the sides it will not dry too good. My hair was still wet on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: ChiNic

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is garbage. Gone are the days when things was made of good materials. My first impression when I looked at the dryer was Nice & Sleek. Then upon pulling it out of the box, I realized it was made out of the cheapest plastic possible. I used it for 15 min and it cut off by it's self. I think it was over heating. I immediately unplugged it. The electric cord was very hot. I refuse to keep it because it's bad quality and a potential fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: It's not adjustable very diffucult to find a place to comfortable sit under it because it only has one height. Out old one (same brand) adjusted and was way easier to use and built better.
customer_reviews.author: Willie N Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not what it use to be
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these 10 year ago and somehow must have gotten rid of it. Ladies, they are not kidding when they say "they don't make things like they used to." This is so "made in China" cheap it's not funny. I mean it technically works (for now), but this is what product liability lawyers are on retainer for. It smells weird, it does not adjust so it only blasts part of the hair, and sadly there really are no better options to buy that I found out there. So - eh.... For now this is what I'll use to heat my Velcros and hair conditioner but let's hope I don't go up in flames.
customer_reviews.author: booklover99

customer_reviews.title: Gramma's during covid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my almost 90 year old Grandmother who is used to getting her hair done at the salon. Grandma was so upset about not being able to go to the salon, it has been a weekly thing for her for years and it was really getting her down. We purchased this hair dryer, a few dozen snap together rollers and some dipity doo and we go do her hair for her once a week. Our only negative is that even on the low setting it does get pretty hot so make sure you turn it off every five or so to cool, dont want to burn Grams tender head. Pretty happy Gramma
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine G

customer_reviews.title: I still like it. Not many options to choose from
customer_reviews.text: It certainly does the job but I miss the medium flow dial. High gets too hot and low is too slow. It is taking me almost an hour to dry hair in curlers. I still like it. Not many options to choose from. I knew Conair would be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kittie

customer_reviews.title: Conair Pro Style Bonnet Hair Dryer, White
customer_reviews.text: like having my own treatments at home but free, easy to use unsnap latch and raise up and click plug in and turn on high. I treat my hair weekly and it's such a savings. I use a hydrating crème and cover with a shower cap. I usually sit for 15-25 mins the turn off and sit with cap on for another 5 mins then remove and rinse with cold water. stores easily once cooled down in the closet. I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.author: Gregory R. Huth

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a budget hair dryer that performs above the price. I have thick, wavy, shoulder length hair and set it in large rollers. The pros: It dries very well on the "high" setting with this hooded dryer. The hood has enough space for large rollers. It folds up very compact for storage and is lightweight. The cons: it sounds like a vacuum cleaner in the room but under the dryer itself the sound is not as loud. I need to sit on a pillow even at the lowest height to get the correct hood height for myself. I'm 5'4" so maybe a taller person would not have this problem. Overall I think it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No, no, no
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this and used it once. It ran for about 7 minutes, then tripped my circuit breaker. I reset it and tried again, the dryer wouldn't work. Huge waste of my time and money. Will return this.
customer_reviews.author: PJB243

customer_reviews.title: Can you spare a couple more twenties?
customer_reviews.text: Spend the additional money if you can... This product arrived on time. It happens to be very weak. Only a hi and low setting and your head has to be ditectly under it (so that you have no visual and eyes are tucked under the cover) bit it still does not seem to blow sufficient heat on the hi setting. Just apend more money and get a more expensive brand. Although this worked properly and arrived undamaged, this did not dry like a normal hair dryer. I bet the bag that connects to the hand held hair dryer works better.
customer_reviews.author: Sanetria Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Conair Pro Bonnet Dryer
customer_reviews.text: You can't adjust the dryer so my hair doesn't get completely dry all over. It is extremely LOUD! This replaced an old Dazey dryer I had for 30 years or more.
customer_reviews.author: Pam J

customer_reviews.title: Air holes did not go to rim of bonnet.
customer_reviews.text: Air holes did not go to rim of bonnet like the image portrays. Hot air was focused mainly on top of head while ends remained wet. The dryer was very light weight, and felt cheaply made. Definitely not like the same style dryer from my childhood. Did not keep.
customer_reviews.author: J Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Compact, and Cost-Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bonnet dryer. I was looking for a dryer with a dome that would fit over a head full of rollers and somewhat replicate the beauty parlor of my grandmother's days. This takes up very little space, is a great price, and it won't snag on curlers like one with a shower cap-style bonnet can. I spent a relaxing hour under the dryer (on the low setting) and emerged with a head full of curls. It took a little work finding the right countertop/chair combination so that the hood would be the correct height, but that's a fine tradeoff for a dryer that can be stowed on an out-of-the-way closet shelf. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: The dryer is extremely to loud. And you can not adjust the temperature and length.
customer_reviews.text: I use this dryer for the 1st time on yesterday, straight out of the box. This dryer is extremely to loud. Along with the motor it has a high pitch whistling sound. I had to turn it off, I could not take the noise. There is also no way to adjust the heat other than high or low and you will not be able to adjust the head of the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: GodsblessedCee

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This thing gets hotter than the dryers at the salon and there is no option to make it cooler! Otherwise it works just fine. Upon first use there is a bit of a burning smell maybe coming from the plastic... It made my fire alarm go off, but this has since stopped :)
customer_reviews.author: User 1988

customer_reviews.title: Thin Hood Dryer
customer_reviews.text: The product is made of cheap thin plastic, you’ve to have a giraffe neck to use this hair dryer, I had to tilt it the whole time using it. No height adjustment and only 2-settings, drying power is good. I’m returning for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlonne Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an at home salon
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It only didn't get 5 stars because it would take forever if sitting to use it to dry your hair. But I bought it because I bleach and color my hair at home and do it for friends as well and this is so helpful and awesome for processing
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Seriously best thing ever! I would highly recommend. Super lightweight easy to use! Only thing I’d recommend is having to put a towel or pillow on the chair so your head is higher. Takes about 5 minutes to heat up but then it’s hot. Buy it you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Seattle sleeper

customer_reviews.title: Could be better but an ok hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm glad I bought this dryer but I'm somewhat disappointed with the hair drying power it takes too long to dry and you have to tilt the hood down to pent rate the hair. It's also really loud. I'm just glad I can still do my hair at home.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: This Is Definitely A No Go!
customer_reviews.text: All I did was open the box and knew this dryer is not for me. It looks cheaply made and to me that spells DANGEROUS! We’re living in the “New Normal” so I’m counting this as a lost of my duckets. Now I read the reviews as opposed to doing so prior to making this purchase and know I’ve made the right decision to not testfate. Trust the reviews, DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY on this dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Opinions Matter

customer_reviews.title: Spend Alittle More
customer_reviews.text: This dryer doesn’t put out enough heat for my thick curly hair. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Ms.J

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer. The only reason I’m giving 4 stars is because the height isn’t adjustable but I knew that when I bought it. The drying is thorough, it’s heats up pretty fast and even reaches the back of my head, I am impressed. No complaints other than I wish the height was adjustable so I could get more comfortable while drying my hair. On High it’s a little loud but my vacuum cleaner is louder & it doesn’t disturb my kids(which I was worried about). Great dryer for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and Trip Circuit Breakers - Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've used this dryer a total of three times. Why - the first time it trip my GFI circuit. It was the only thing plugged in and I use my had held dryer there all the time. So, I moved it to another GFI plug just to be sure, it tripped that one too. Finally, I tried the GFI near the panel and it tripped that one. I don't use this device and wish I could return it but its too late. I would NOT buy this device.
customer_reviews.author: smlwndr333

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This model is much improved over our previous one. The electrical cord is heavier and does not heat up. The bonnet catch actually catches the bonnet! and the upward extension of the neck of the dryer is very helpful to my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Castellano-Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This dryer was a piece of junk. It was made of cheap plastic, the height doesn’t lower down, when it’s on high it burns my scalp when it’s on low it doesn’t dry my hair, it doesn’t dry the bottom part of my hair, and it was very loud. I returned it and got my money back. I definitely don't recommend buying this dryer. I don't understand how it ended up with a high star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Feehan

customer_reviews.title: Good attempt poorly executed.
customer_reviews.text: .. I bought this for my wife and she had to spend an excessive amount of time to get the hair done as the air comes only from the top, so she had to move the head constantly; in addition to that she ended up with the scalp at the top of her head read as she had stayed standing at the sun for a long period
customer_reviews.author: Euclides Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Spend a bit more money for a more reputable product. This one STINKS!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE! Read the other reviews and heed the warnings! DO NOT BUY. it does dry your hair but it is extremely unmanageable: only two temps (searing and Luke warm), only one position, heat does not surround
customer_reviews.author: nona cohen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sit under dryer!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this hair dryer for a few weeks. I have to say it’s amazing, heat on Lo is good for deep conditioning/ hot oil treatments. The Hi setting is great for roller sets. Now there is a way adjust the height of the dryer. You have to hold the neck and the little adjustable bar with the ridges does in fact move up and down. So yes it is adjustable! Love my dryer!! Thank you Conair! 🥰
customer_reviews.author: renate ramdhan

customer_reviews.title: Used 4x-stopped working!!
customer_reviews.text: Used 4x when mother visited. Unbelievably poor quality Massive disappointment & loss of money due to being used a total of 4x.
customer_reviews.author: Technocat

customer_reviews.title: This hair dryer is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: It was a joke in my family when I got this hair dryer because it was "old fashioned". I love this hair dryer. I have very thick hair and if I use rollers on my hair it takes forever to dry but with this dryer, .y hair dries quickly
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Simmen

customer_reviews.title: Love the low profile.
customer_reviews.text: Solved a hair drying issue easily. Wife and daughter uses it with ease. It does vibrate and slides across a glass table too easily. I like that it can be compressed and stored easily.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Great hairdryer for the price. I didn’t experience any burning of the machine or the outlet while using ( perhaps some outlets can’t withstand the watts of this dryer) Holes for heat to exit are only at the top so placing a towel around your neck to trap the heat & keep it circulating evenly is something even my hairdresser does at her place. In order to achieve dryness on nape of my neck, yes I did have to tilt/adjust my head but hey, it’s better than $40 at the salon. I’m happy !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth getting.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item since Dec. I decided to try it out save money instead of going to Beauty Shop.It doesn't get very hot at alllll. It's supposed to be adjustable but the base only moves enough to let it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So impressed and glad to have invested the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, low heat is more than high enough to deep condition my hair, and the height adjusts to allow me to sit comfortably. 30 minutes watching tv and I’m finished.
customer_reviews.author: AISHA L CARPENTER

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional hair colorist and with covid 19 this came in very handy to process colors at home!!!, great heat, compact, large hood
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: it will get the job done eventually but it does not heat up to well and the height isn't adjustable so it makes it hard and uncomfortable to sit under it.
customer_reviews.author: andrea s.

customer_reviews.title: Not made for all.
customer_reviews.text: The dryer doesn't adjust with the height at all. It also seems it doesn't get hot enough. Its gonna take a lot more time. Its very lightweight. Compared to my old dryer its very loud. There is no distinction between high and low. My last dryer I had for over 10 yrs. And with three ladies in my home i will have to purchase another type soon.
customer_reviews.author: shakira jones

customer_reviews.title: Wash & Go curls are LIVING
customer_reviews.text: I love the folding design of this, it’s very easy to store and set up. My wash & go’s have been AMAZING since I started using the dryer to set my curls before heading out for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Neka Lanoza

customer_reviews.title: Good dyer, does the work
customer_reviews.text: This dryer works very well, it dries evenly and I like the way it saves me money in my wife's extra trips to the salon (wink). She says she could use a third heat position.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: works well but,
customer_reviews.text: does the job well but the piece to keep the head part up breaks !!! and you are stuck holding it up the whole time !!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: It works. It’s a bit less quality than I ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. It’s a bit less quality than I expected but that’s my fault. Price should have clued me in. It also blew a fuse (house) the first time I used it so keep in mind it takes a lot of power. In retrospect, I maybe should have looked at a more expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth having one at home if you do your own hair coloring! it's a must.
customer_reviews.author: mAdCoOk

customer_reviews.title: Good for natural diffuser hairstyle and roller set.
customer_reviews.text: lightweight portable dryer for natural diffuser hairstyle also good for roller set. It does not have adjustable settings for height adjustments but i have a high table and dining chair that works well. Good alternative to blow drying.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Works great. My (short (just below ears)
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My (short (just below ears), medium-weight hair) dries in about 7 minutes, with no frizz, unlike using a blow dryer. (I do use product to control frizz and protect from heat). I use it on top of my desk which is the right height. After using, I close it up, and put on the floor under the desk. Some people said it's noisy; it's the same volume of noise as a blow dryer. It's great if I want to leave my hair curly, just dry and I'm done, or now that it's winter, I dry it and then use my curling iron to straighten/smooth it out. Recommend this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: MEED

customer_reviews.title: Dries hair really fast, but no adjustable height.
customer_reviews.text: This dryer dries my hair real fast. The only draw back is that the height is NOT adjustable, which is the only reason that I ordered it, was because the description said that it was adjustable. 😕
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is very powerful and does an amazing job of getting hair dry. Due to Covid-19 not being able to get to the hair stylist, I purchased this for my mother. We are both pleased at how quickly this hair dryer dries hair. My mother only has to sit under the bonnet for 15 minutes before her short hair in rollers is completely dry. We both love the compact form, it is easy to store. We both highly recommend this hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: I prefer GoldNHot brand, but ALL of these heat styling tools have definitely gotten cheaper in terms of hardware and make. Basically, it works well enough for the price point, but it is prone to breaking easily if mishandled in any way. Buyer be cautious, but it's an overall worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmia

customer_reviews.title: Should Be A Children's Toy
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely light. It is a hassle to keep it stable & upright. It doesn't get very hot. I returned it IMMEDIATELY.
customer_reviews.author: Nic TheDragonSlayer

customer_reviews.title: Hot bonnet not dryer
customer_reviews.text: The dryer just got hot it’s doesn’t really dry hair. Great for hair treatments but not for wash and gos and drying hair.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a dryer stuck on this head thing. Useless. Blows on one part of your head not all over. Takes forever to dry
customer_reviews.author: J Alley

customer_reviews.title: Not that satisfied
customer_reviews.text: With this dryer I have to sit under way longer than usual. It is so noisy. I only ordered this because I like to set own hair other than going to the hair dresser all the time and my other dryer had to go to hair dryer heaven
customer_reviews.author: Average shopper

customer_reviews.title: Get what u pay for I guess
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t get hot enough... cheaply made and height doesn’t adjust
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed that the air jets are only on the upper half and partially down the hood. They don’t come all the way down like a professional Drywood. But a good value for the money anyway!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hairdresser who comes to her clients' houses. It's perfect for what she needs it for. Has a high/low switch but everything works great. Plus great price.
customer_reviews.author: Julaine

customer_reviews.title: I'd really like to send it back
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheap looking and the heat settings are only "high" & "low". I'd really like to send it back!
customer_reviews.author: Myra Swann

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and no durablity
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that I only had this product for one month and the top has started to flip over if you move any. The top will not stay up. The little plastic clap that hold the hood up does not hold it very well because it keeps falling over. I noticed this a week ago but didn't stop then to return and now it is too late to return. Not sure if it's something wrong with it or if they all do this but very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bryant

customer_reviews.title: An excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bonnet hair dryer. It is simple to operate and does exactly what I expected it to do. The temperature is just right and using it is a comfortable and relaxing experience.
customer_reviews.author: GAL

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer
customer_reviews.text: Product works, I just need to figure how to lower it for my height. Otherwise good product, dry hair quickly. Upset with UPS leaving my item in front of my door when I was not home instead package room
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: This only has a high and low With a off button
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I was disappointed It wasn’t blowing enough for me idk the holes were located at the top so it took a while for my sides and the back part of my hair to dry ....waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Nails by Joey242

customer_reviews.title: COVID19 beauty solution!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT!... No more grays for this mama during these Covod-19 times! Every home needs one if they have females!... great for all ages! My little girls LOVE to play salon! And I love to play... lookin’ good mama! 😀😂. Works great! Easy to fold and put away! Light weight for its body! Does the trick perfectly! It’s a little loud... but who cares! Doesn’t bother me sitting under the hood!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Munson

customer_reviews.title: Conair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This dryer makes ALOT of use, no one can be sleep in the house the dryer power is not all that great, you might as well buy a blow dryer
customer_reviews.author: Trina Harper

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this dryer before and I really like it, however I wish the part you sit under would go further down over your head. I still have to sit on a pillow so I’m tall enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My Second Conair
customer_reviews.text: This was my second Conair Pro Style Hair Bonnet Dryer to purchase. This one I ordered for my vacation home so I could continue to dry my hair while away from home. I consider this the perfect product for rolling and drying my hair in a short length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed works great for me. Has 2 setting low and high, cap is good fit. It is bit noisy forces you to have quiet time while in use. No TV or radio, you will not be able to hear, just plan on having a good book or magazine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bonnet is not adjustable and only 2 settings Hi and Low.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed, only 2 settings. HI and LOW. The bonnet is not adjustable and the dryer is LOUD. I have had many man dryer and I guess I was expecting big changes. Yes, all dryers are loud..I was hoping for something a little bit less noisy. The BONNET should definitely be adjustable, why remove this option and WHY WOULD YOU REMOVE THE COOL DOWN SETTING?
customer_reviews.author: yvette garcia

customer_reviews.title: Can't be Adjusted
customer_reviews.text: The details lied, it cannot be adjusted. It's definitely loud and with two settings, well, the high heat is extremely hot and low is exactly that. Would have been a perfect product had it been adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: Last

customer_reviews.title: Great, Easy to Use Hair Dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my eighty-nine year old Mother who finds it difficult to use a portable hair dryer for any length of time. How she can sit and let the dryer do it's job. This dryer works great and is simple and easy to use. It was shipped quickly and was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: dpsr2019

customer_reviews.title: not at all satisfied the air flow only on the top
customer_reviews.text: The air came just out of the top the holes inside the dryer not evenly distributed only drying top of my hair setting either said cool or hot no in-between the cooler was actually very warm , would not advise buying also said the height was adjustable was not had to sit on two large pillows
customer_reviews.author: Carol  Evers

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have is a just ing it to where I feel it’s sitting comfortable on my head. The drying power is great and the price was great
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: where to put it.
customer_reviews.text: I only issue with this is trying to find a place to put it for use and for storage. other than that it's a fine working item.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Newson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter with curly hair. It's so easy to use and portable enough to move around the house. I usually do her hair in the kitchen/living room area and I love the fact that it doesn't take up much space. It's also easy to unfold and fold. It's my first purchase of bonnet hair dryer and the price and ease of use made it an easy decision for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine M

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dryer for what I was needing. I do deep conditioning treatments and this serves the purpose and doesn’t take up much room. Yes it does smell like it is burning when you first start it up on the high setting but the smell disappears when it warms up.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: It could very easily break and be unrepairable
customer_reviews.text: I can see why other reviewers found the parts to be flimsy and plastic. It could very easily break and be unrepairable. But the heat is steady and well distributed. The cooler setting does not burn my scalp and the hotter setting is great for a quick blast to get drying started on my long hair. I will say to be very careful with the plastic parts and it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The dryer only has two settings high and low. On the low setting it will take a good while to dry your hair. On the high setting it got so hot it was burning my scalp. It would be nice if they had a medium setting.
customer_reviews.author: Carla J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home
customer_reviews.text: Work great for when I do my hair at home. I can have salon quality hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife,  happy life 🤗
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer was a Christmas gift for my wife. After researching various dryers this one stood out against the rest. The price range were similar but the name brand made the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer, great price. It gets pretty hot on high so usually I only need to use the low setting for deep conditioning. I def recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer. Light weight to bring with you to client appointments
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight portable dryer. I bring this with me to process perms and dry rollersets for my elderly clients that can’t get out.
customer_reviews.author: C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Good basic dryer
customer_reviews.text: Sitting in normal height chair most of drying on top of head back barely warm. Easy open and close pop up style. Hi-low and off
customer_reviews.author: L. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Nice dryer
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is the dryer is to tall. I have no luck lowering the hood of the dryer. It says its adjustable but I don't really know about that
customer_reviews.author: MUST CUM BACK

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: A good light weight dryer that gets hot with a big enough hood. The downfall is its very nosey and the air distribution is not even. These dryers always have good air flow in the front but lack the same air flow in the back. Good enough for the low price but is made out of a cheaper plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer! My beautician retired and sold her business because of Covid 19 after doing my hair for 38 years and I trust no one else...I bought this dryer and when it was delivered we met at my office and with this dryer she was able to highlight my hair! It worked just as well as the expensive ones she had in her shop!
customer_reviews.author: M.R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use dryer
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is very helpful when I need to dry my hair fast. It sits easily on any flat surface. It smelled like smoke when used on high heat at first, but has since stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this a few months ago, i wanted to wait to give a review. i love it, everyone gave crazy reviews but i still bought it and 4 months later its still in good condition, yes i used it on high heat. no issues.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: I basically love this dryer with one small dislike...you cannot change the position of the hood i.e. tilt it up or down. Once it’s in position...that’s it. So usually I end up having to rest it on the counter and then tilt it down over my head into the position I want it to be in. Other than that this is a great dryer and does exactly what it’s supposed to do for my naturally curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Arcangeli

customer_reviews.title: CONAIR 1875 WATT PRO STYLE BONNET DRYER
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT recommend the purchase of this dryer. There is no way to adjust the height to an appropriate level. I wasted my money when purchasing this product. Attempted to return it on the 31st day. Amazon's Customer Service Rep promised to have Conair's Customer Service contact me. That never happened. I AM STUCK WITH A DRYER THAT I CANNOT USE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets pretty hot but does not adjust easily
customer_reviews.text: The hood does not extend far. I have to stack books on a chair or under the dryer in order to adjust the height. It does get pretty hot quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: A good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait till I have used this dry few times to make sure it was really good. And after a few times I can confidently say this was a great purchase. Very lightweight, gets nice a got to get the hair good & dry, it is a little nosier then I would like but well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimm

customer_reviews.title: Burning Sensation!
customer_reviews.text: I wish i bought a bonnet dryer. Its the worst. It gets so hot in the middle my head and it doesnt matter if its on Hi or Lo. It took about 20 minutes to dry my hair tho (which is weird, considering i almost burned myself the entire time) the only reason i haven't returned it is because i missed the return policy. But if u ignore the burning then its a great dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Kimaura

product_meta.title: Conair 1875 Watt Pro Style Bonnet Hair Dryer
product_meta.description: Style Name:Bonnet Hair Dryer| Color:WhiteTake a look under the hood of this portable Conair Salon Style Bonnet Hair Dryer and you'll find a powerful way to gently dry and style your hair with this bonnet hair dryer for home. This salon style bonnet dryer is fully adjustable, with variable height and heat controls, and has an extra-large hood to accommodate jumbo curlers. This bonnet hair blow dryer by Conair brings you home salon styling at an affordable price.
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL SALON DRYING AT HOME: 1875 watts of even air flow distribution, with 2 heat/speed settings, dries hair quickly, gently and evenly with uniform heat
EXTRA LARGE HOOD: The Conair Pro Style Bonnet Hair Dryer features an extra-large hood with adjustable height for comfort and convenience. Perfect for roller sets and deep conditioning
FOLDS NEATLY AND COMPACT: For easy storage, this bonnet hair dryer packs up easily and even contains a carrying handle for easy portability
LEADER IN HAIR DRYERS: From traditional bonnets to hi-tech dryers equipped with cutting-edge technology, Conair has a great selection of hair dryers for the whole family
CONAIR HAIR CARE: Since 1959, we have made innovative small appliances, hair styling tools, & more. Our hair care line includes high-quality hair dryers, brushes, styling tools, & hair accessories

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
